ygData.subject: The Legacy of Hell Beast
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: If you havent figured this out yet, Im leaveing the RPG. I have turned over Commandership of the Predacons to Wild Dance Mare and I want him also to

OOC: If you havent figured this out yet, Im leaveing the RPG. I have turned 
over Commandership of the Predacons to Wild Dance Mare and I want him also to 
replace me on the council. Please, do NOT take me off the list, I enjoy 
reading the posts but I am unable to keep up with my responsabilities by 
writing them. I was one of the first members of this RPG, and after a year I 
am proud to say it is an excellent association. Thank you all for a wonderful 
time.

~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: The Decepticon vessle was complete. With the help from Transanulas and 
Gremlin they had killed alot of time. Now, they began to move equitment from 
Ominous Prime's lair into the ship. After the move, they began to seal the 
caveren and then the ship slowly exited the cave and was airborne. :::

::: Ominous ::: Tell Hell Beast were coming to get him.

::: Marine nodded and sent the message. :::

~~~~~~~~~~

::: Hell Beast shouted orders and had the Predacons that were leaveing with 
him take important items and leave items for the next Predacon Commander. :::

::: Pheniox ::: The energon cargo holds are ready to be loaded on the shuttle.

::: Hell Beast shighed. He was going to miss the Neo Beast Wars, but time was 
gaining and he had to depart. :::

::: Hell Beast looked at his crew ::: Pheniox, and Jackle, you will come with 
me to Cybertron.

::: Black Aracnia spun around in shock, as did Demonaand a strange bot that 
looked similar to Hell BEast who just entered. :::

::: Black Aracnia ::: What? Thats not fair! I deserve to go!

::: Hell Beast pointed his wepon level with her head, ::: You deserve to die 
with the bitch Demona!

::: Suddenly, Stryfe aimed his gun at Hell Beast ::: Sorry, dad, but im 
taking command o-

::: Jackle fired a single shot into his head, sending him into stasis. :::

::: Demona ::: No!

::: Hell Beast fired on Demona, sending her down to the floor with a groan, 
dead. :::

:: Black Aracnia, in the confusion, transformed into beast mode and escaped 
the ship. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Bring my son with us, he can be reprogramed. Dump the body 
of Demona is the antimatter chamber.

~~~~~~~~`

::: The Decepticon shuttle hovered over the Predacon base. Useing tractor 
beams in successfully transported the energon into its own cargo holds. Then, 
Hell BEast, Jackle, and Pheniox boarded. Transanulas, Gremlin, MArine and 
Ominous waited. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Ah, I will miss it.

::: Gremlin ::: What of Megatron?

::: Hell Beast ::: Good point.....

~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Megatron glanced around his chamber, Ra had vanished, but Waspinator 
stayed. He felt a change going on. He knew Hell Beast was leaveing, but he 
would stay to corrupt the history of Cybertron as long as he could. :::

~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Set and Ra ran as swift as they could to the Decepticon shuttle. Quickly 
they boarded and explained themselfs. :::

::: Set ::: I cant stay here anymore! Im sure that they think Im dead and all 
my momey is being split up among my workers. I must go back and look after 
it. Ra, being my body guard, is coming with me.

::: Hell Beast nodded. He didnt care as long as he was going to be able to 
leave. :::

::: The shuttle rose higher and higher through the sky until it made a rather 
bumby orbit. Now, Hell BEast, Gremlin, Jackle, Pheniox, MArine, Transanulas, 
Ominous Prime, Set, and Ra all looked down at the prehistoic planet with a 
heavey heart. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: It was good while it lasted, but we must put the past 
behinde us. Everyone to your stations!

::: They all wnet to there stations, pressed the correct keys, and a 
transwarp corridor opened before them. :::

::: Hell BEast, with a sound of victory in his voice that had been long 
missed, ::: Forward, set a course for Cybertron. The war agianst the Maximals 
and Autobots has just begun!

::: With the laughter of the crew, the small Decepticon shuttle passed 
through and the corridor and it closed. :::

~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Black Aracnia cursed. She was now stuck on this damn planet. All that 
remained was the Predacon base. She entered, set up the defences, and sent 
out a message. :::

::: Black Aracnia ::: All Predacons, Hell Beast has left the planet for 
Cybertron. I encourage that Megatrons group come and join with Hell Beast's 
former group to make one powerful fraction. Sadly, I was left behinde but 
that isnt going to stop me!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Thats all folks. I have said my peace with my characters. The fate of Black 
Aracnia and Waspinator and Rat Trap is up to Wild Dance Mare. Now, I want to 
write the future of my characters briefly in this next section.

    After there return to Cybertron, Hell Beast resumed office as Senetor and 
eventually made his way on to the Council. With his supply of Energon, the 
Predacons made fantastic advancements in warfare.
    Pheniox took command of her Anti-Maximal Terrorist group and took out a 
fleet of ships by the time of her death in battle. A memorial stands in her 
honor on Cybertron.
    Jackle went into the Espionage business and infiltrated several Autobot 
offices. He was caputerd on one such mission and imprisoned. After a messy 
and bloody escape his where-abouts are unknown.
    Gremlin went into the military and turned out to make a fantastic 
Colonel. He invaded a Maximal colony and still holds it in occupation.
    Transanulas, along with Ominous Prime, researched Liquid Energon and with 
it made radical changes to fule. Entire fleets of Predacon ships now run on 
it, and a whole new species of Transformer was created and called 
Energonians. Ominous got his wish. Transanulas, even though he is  insane, is 
a respected Scientist.
    Set returned to his company to find it broken and spilt among his 
minions. He had them killed and resumed command of the largest Predacon 
franchise in the Galaxy. Ra is still his body guard, and also has a large 
part in the underworld of Cybertron.
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Hell Beast retired at his old age. On a small remote moon he built a 
manor house. He remembers the days of the Neo Beast Wars and smiles at his 
successes. Now, an old bot and out of date, he mostly spends his time writing 
books on his experiences and gives advice to those who are in politics. With 
his influence he has gained much respect. 
    Now, he sits at a window and stares out at a planet similar to earth and 
wonders what the fates of his friends, commrads, and enemy's were. :::

This is the end of the story of Hell Beast and the first crew of Predacons 
that fought in the NEo Beast Wars.

The End
